entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
